examples.sentence: Location of action - where you do something

sections.heading: Core Functions
sections.content:
で has 4 main uses:

Location of action - where you do something Means/method - how/by what means Cause/reason - because of what Material - made of what

sections.heading: 1. Location of Action
sections.content:
Where an action takes place:

図書館で勉強する - "study at the library" レストランで食べる - "eat at a restaurant" 公園で遊ぶ - "play in the park" 家で寝る - "sleep at home"

Key: The location where action happens.

sections.heading: 2. Means/Method
sections.content:
Tool, method, or transportation used:

ペンで書く - "write with a pen" 日本語で話す - "speak in Japanese" 電車で行く - "go by train" インターネットで調べる - "research on the internet"

sections.heading: 3. Cause/Reason
sections.content:
Because of, due to:

病気で休む - "rest due to illness" 台風で中止 - "canceled because of typhoon" 事故で遅れる - "late because of accident"

sections.heading: 4. Material
sections.content:
Made of, from what material:

木で作る - "make with wood" 紙でできている - "made of paper"

sections.heading: で vs に
sections.content:
Critical difference:

| で | に | | ------------------ | ------------------ | | Action location | Existence location | | 図書館で勉強する | 図書館にいる | | "study at library" | "be at library" |

で = doing something somewhere に = being somewhere

See: に vs で Explained

children.heading: Action Location
children.content: [Place]で [Action verb] 学校で勉強する - "study at school"

children.heading: Transportation
children.content: [Vehicle]で 行く/来る 車で行く - "go by car"

children.heading: Language/Tool
children.content: [Tool]で [Action] 箸で食べる - "eat with chopsticks"

children.heading: Cause
children.content: [Reason]で [Result] 雨で中止 - "canceled due to rain"

children.heading: Existence verbs (use に)
children.content: ✗ 部屋である ✓ 部屋にある "be in the room"

children.heading: Walking/on foot (use 歩いて)
children.content: ✗ 足で行く ✓ 歩いて行く "go on foot"

sections.heading: で vs を for Movement
sections.content: 道を歩く - "walk on the road" (を for path) 公園で歩く - "walk in the park" (で for area)

sections.heading: Verbs with で
sections.content:
Common action verbs:

勉強する - study 働く - work 遊ぶ - play 会う - meet 買う - buy 食べる - eat 飲む - drink

sections.heading: Multiple で in Sentence
sections.content: 友達と図書館で日本語で勉強する "Study Japanese with friends at the library in Japanese" (と = with, で = at, で = in/by means of)

sections.heading: Key Takeaways
sections.content: ✓ Location where action happens ✓ Means/method/tool used ✓ Cause or reason ✓ Material something's made of

children.heading: Legal
children.content: Privacy Policy Terms of Service Cookie Policy
